name: Go Home - Draw and Ride
description:
OH NO! I am lost....
Need to find my way back home...

CAN YOU HELP ME TO GET BACK HOME?

Draw lines to guide my bike to the goal and I will do my best to reach it.
Follow me on my journey as I go through places and meet lots of challenging obstacles.

Would be great if I can also collect all the stars along the way right?
Since, usually there's a reward for every stars collected...

Please, do something because I want to GO HOME!
